title: Hemingway
creator_credit: Julian Claman, McGraw-Hill Films and National Broadcasting Company
brief_description: Chronicles the life of the American Nobel Prize winner, from boyhood through his years as a journalist and novelist until his death. Major literary and artistic personalities are seen including James Joyce, Gertrude Stein, Pablo Picasso, Lincoln Steffens, and F. Scott Fitzgerald. Documents the turbulent times of World War I, World War II and the Spanish Civil War and his participation.
